insights.Personal:

  - [2024-06-18,ENI-03943526364731890657,airtable_notes]

insights.Business:
## Business
- Family office AUM ~ $600M; currently rebuilding cash-flow engine and reorganizing governance across multiple family branches
  - [2024-06-18,ENI-03943526364731890657,airtable_notes]
  - [2024-09-18,ENI-6101915573798282920,airtable_notes]
- Family office is effectively unwinding / restructuring; exploring partnership with Sebastian and Gaitana to consolidate branches and reduce overhead
  - [2025-01-07,ENI-8448196311210605119,airtable_notes]
- Actively pursuing a partnership/onboarding of another family (~$200M investable assets) to form a multi-family or shared MFO/OCIO infrastructure
  - [2025-01-07,ENI-8448196311210605119,airtable_notes]
- Spinning out a new venture: Vega Investment Management (VIM) — MFO/OCIO/Advisory hybrid targeting 5–10 family clients, target client investable assets $75M–$500M; initial team is Matt solo with plans to build investment & back-office as clients onboard
  - [2025-04-30,ENI-04407530342414319257,airtable_notes]
- Technology / reporting preferences: Addepar (Navigator) as primary reporting; Arch for custodian data ingestion; Mirador for data flow; Copia viewed as less reliable
  - [2025-02-24,ENI-7105007308425489331,airtable_notes]
  - [2024-06-18,ENI-03943526364731890657,airtable_notes]
insights.Investing:
## Investing
- Primary focus: PE secondaries (especially GP-led secondaries) — active diligence and allocation interest
  - [2024-09-18,ENI-6101915573798282920,airtable_notes]
  - [2024-06-21,ENI-2498083535819452854,airtable_notes]
- Short-duration private credit and receivables finance (merchant advancing, healthcare receivables, short-duration credit strategies) — evaluating sidecars and small commitments; examples include healthcare receivables, receivables purchased at discounts, senior-secured to settlements
  - [2025-03-27,ENI-7618428645163192688,airtable_notes]
  - [2024-09-18,ENI-6101915573798282920,airtable_notes]
- Direct/special-situation real-estate debt experience (Tourmalet Tactical Opportunities / reverse-mortgage-related strategies) — comfortable with short-turnaround, tactical RE debt that can return capital quickly
  - [2025-01-07,ENI-8448196311210605119,airtable_notes]
  - [2025-03-27,ENI-7618428645163192688,airtable_notes]
- Creative credit / structured strategies: bridge lending funds and sidecars (has recent commitments to bridge lending funds and interest in Banner Ridge-style credit secondaries)
  - [2025-05-20,ENI-8419324926890082592,airtable_notes]
  - [2025-01-07,ENI-8448196311210605119,airtable_notes]
- Alternative royalty & intellectual-property income strategies (music royalties / Elevate) — made a commitment; views risk-reward favorably relative to some traditional strategies
  - [2025-03-27,ENI-7618428645163192688,airtable_notes]
  - [2025-02-12,ENI-02631877510421804486,airtable_notes]
- Interest in preferred-equity private equity strategies (Levine Leichtman — pref equity PE fund); plans to connect to manager in Q4 (fund currently closed)
  - [2025-05-20,ENI-8419324926890082592,airtable_notes]
  - [2024-06-21,ENI-2498083535819452854,airtable_notes]
- Track record / portfolio objectives: targeting mid- to high-teens net returns with shorter-duration privates (4–6 year max payback), willing to accept some cycle sensitivity but avoiding very long J‑curve exposures
  - [2024-09-18,ENI-6101915573798282920,airtable_notes]
  - [2025-01-07,ENI-8448196311210605119,airtable_notes]
- Specific investments / recent allocations: committed to Tourmalet (special-sit RE debt), Elevate (music royalties), Marblegate ERC fund (via member intro), and at least one bridge-lending fund more recently
  - [2025-05-20,ENI-8419324926890082592,airtable_notes]
  - [2025-03-27,ENI-7618428645163192688,airtable_notes]
  - [2024-09-18,ENI-6101915573798282920,airtable_notes]
- Explicit avoidances / cautions: prefers to avoid large mega-funds ("S&P 500 of alts" style managers like KKR/Apollo), is wary of CRE debt exposure, and is skeptical of real-asset shipping funds due to fee structures and blow-up risk (specific mention of Easterly Clear Ocean concerns)
  - [2025-04-30,ENI-04407530342414319257,airtable_notes]
  - [2024-09-18,ENI-6101915573798282920,airtable_notes]
  - [2025-05-20,ENI-8419324926890082592,airtable_notes]

- Has experience diligencing public markets (public equities) as part of investment background
  - [2024-06-18,ENI-2533087806790872590,airtable_notes]
- Comfortable diligencing preferred-equity strategies (pref equity) in addition to private-equity secondaries
  - [2024-06-18,ENI-2533087806790872590,airtable_notes]
- Interested in non-correlated asset classes and "anything unique and in between" — open to niche, differentiated exposures
  - [2024-06-18,ENI-2533087806790872590,airtable_notes]
insights.3i:
## 3i
- Positive platform feedback: has sourced unique deal flow and completed at least one investment (Marblegate ERC fund) via a 3i member connection
  - [2024-09-18,ENI-6101915573798282920,airtable_notes]

  - [2025-03-27,ENI-7618428645163192688,airtable_notes]
- Action items logged with 3i: will share memos for Elevate and Tourmalet; 3i to facilitate introductions (Dawkins Advisory / OCOO solution); update Matt's contact and bio on the platform for Vega Investment Management
  - [2025-02-12,ENI-02631877510421804486,airtable_notes]
  - [2025-04-30,ENI-04407530342414319257,airtable_notes]
insights.Deals:
## Deals
This Member **Has Experience** and Is Comfortable Diligencing These Asset Classes & Sectors
- PE secondaries (GP‑led and LP/GP secondaries)
  - [2024-09-18,ENI-6101915573798282920,airtable_notes]
  - [2024-06-21,ENI-2498083535819452854,airtable_notes]
- Short-duration private credit and receivables financing (merchant advancing, healthcare receivables, settlement receivables)
  - [2025-03-27,ENI-7618428645163192688,airtable_notes]
  - [2024-09-18,ENI-6101915573798282920,airtable_notes]
- Special-situation / tactical real-estate debt (Tourmalet, reverse-mortgage-related opportunities with quick turn profiles)
  - [2025-01-07,ENI-8448196311210605119,airtable_notes]
  - [2025-03-27,ENI-7618428645163192688,airtable_notes]
- Alternative income strategies (music royalties / royalty funds e.g., Elevate)
  - [2025-03-27,ENI-7618428645163192688,airtable_notes]
  - [2025-02-12,ENI-02631877510421804486,airtable_notes]
- Public markets (experience diligencing public equities)
  - [2024-06-18,ENI-2533087806790872590,airtable_notes]
- Non-correlated asset classes (comfort evaluating differentiated, low-correlation strategies)
  - [2024-06-18,ENI-2533087806790872590,airtable_notes]
- Preferred-equity (pref equity) strategies — experience evaluating preferred-equity structures within private equity
  - [2024-06-18,ENI-2533087806790872590,airtable_notes]

This Member **Is Interested In Exploring** These Asset Classes, Sectors, and Strategies
- Preferred-equity private equity strategies (Levine Leichtman pref-equity fund) — intends to connect in Q4
  - [2025-05-20,ENI-8419324926890082592,airtable_notes]
  - [2024-06-21,ENI-2498083535819452854,airtable_notes]
- Infrastructure and large-cap fund opportunities (WholeStreet / infrastructure funds) for diversified, shorter-duration exposures
  - [2024-09-18,ENI-6101915573798282920,airtable_notes]
- Bridge-lending / credit secondaries and sidecars (Banner Ridge, Marble Gate sidecars, ERTC strategies)
  - [2025-01-07,ENI-8448196311210605119,airtable_notes]
  - [2025-03-27,ENI-7618428645163192688,airtable_notes]
- Niche alternative strategies with quicker return profiles and mid/high‑teens net return targets (e.g., Formentera, Whitehawk, Cross Plains style funds)
  - [2024-06-21,ENI-2498083535819452854,airtable_notes]
- Non-correlated asset classes and "anything unique and in between" (explicit interest in differentiated, low-correlation opportunities)
  - [2024-06-18,ENI-2533087806790872590,airtable_notes]

This Member **Wants to Avoid** These Asset Classes, Sectors, and Strategies
- Large, top-tier buyout 'megafunds' ("S&P 500 of alts" style managers like KKR/Apollo)
  - [2025-04-30,ENI-04407530342414319257,airtable_notes]
- Broad CRE debt exposure (prefers to minimize CRE debt in portfolio)
  - [2024-09-18,ENI-6101915573798282920,airtable_notes]
- High-fee / high-blowup-risk real-asset shipping strategies (concerns noted specifically re: Easterly Clear Ocean fee structure and tail risk)
  - [2025-05-20,ENI-8419324926890082592,airtable_notes]
insights.Introductions:
## Introductions
**Looking to meet:**
- Another family (single-family or multi-family partner) with ~ $200M+ investable assets interested in partnering / onboarding to create MFO/OCIO shared infrastructure
  - [2025-01-07,ENI-8448196311210605119,airtable_notes]
- Dawkins Advisory (OCOO solution) / OCOO-level operators to help stand up back‑office and operations for Vega Investment Management
  - [2025-04-30,ENI-04407530342414319257,airtable_notes]
- Specific member/network introductions suggested or requested: Sammy Shiro (Aventura MFO contact), Adam Blum (Old Hickory Partners), Dan Greenblatt (overlapping mandate), Maria Alejandra Montealegre
  - [2025-03-27,ENI-7618428645163192688,airtable_notes]
  - [2024-06-21,ENI-2498083535819452854,airtable_notes]
  - [2024-09-18,ENI-6101915573798282920,airtable_notes]
- Introductions to Levine Leichtman / preferred-equity PE contacts (to consider when the fund reopens in Q4)
  - [2025-05-20,ENI-8419324926890082592,airtable_notes]

**Avoid introductions to:**
- Large-scale, brand-name mega-manager sales teams framed as "broad index/allocations" (described as the "S&P 500 of alts")
  - [2025-04-30,ENI-04407530342414319257,airtable_notes]
- CRE debt originators and traditional real-estate operating sponsors (member preference is to avoid broad CRE risk)
  - [2024-09-18,ENI-6101915573798282920,airtable_notes]
- Sponsors of real-asset shipping strategies or similar high-fee, high-tail-risk vehicles (explicit caution re: Easterly Clear Ocean)
  - [2025-05-20,ENI-8419324926890082592,airtable_notes]
